thread.title: Black Sabbath Madison Square Garden Tickets: QueenBeeTickets.com Reduces Prices on Tickets for Black Sabbath’s Final Concert at MSG in New York, NY on February 25, 2016
thread.title_full: Black Sabbath Madison Square Garden Tickets: QueenBeeTickets.com Reduces Prices on Tickets for Black Sabbath’s Final Concert at MSG in New York, NY on February 25, 2016

title: Black Sabbath Madison Square Garden Tickets: QueenBeeTickets.com Reduces Prices on Tickets for Black Sabbath’s Final Concert at MSG in New York, NY on February 25, 2016
text:
By: ABNewswire - Press Release Distribution Service September 12, 2015 at 03:00 AM EDT Black Sabbath Madison Square Garden Tickets: QueenBeeTickets.com Reduces Prices on Tickets for Black Sabbath’s Final Concert at MSG in New York, NY on February 25, 2016 Black Sabbath Madison Square Garden Tickets at QueenBeeTickets.com “The End” Tour begins next year on January 20 in Omaha, and trusted provider QueenBeeTickets.com has reduced the price of Black Sabbath Madison Square Garden tickets. The rockers are touring one last time, and the North American leg of their journey will end with the February 25 New York show. Concertgoers will want to obtain tickets for Black Sabbath concert in New York at reduced prices. 
It has now been announced that the heavy metal band will no longer tour after next year. The entertainers will visit U.S. and Canadian cities in January and February, and they intend to make stops in Australia and New Zealand during the month of April. Additional shows may also be announced next month, a fact that interested fans should keep in mind in case the band members have not yet mentioned a concert popping up in their town. 
Visit QueenBeeTickets.com to browse the selection of Black Sabbath tickets at reduced prices. 
Tickets for Black Sabbath concert in New York are certain to sell quickly to the point of disappearing completely. The Big Apple contains many heavy metal fans who will definitely want to be a part of the band’s final tour, especially since the group will appear at famous Madison Square Garden. The February 25 show is wrapping up the North American leg of the tour, making it an even more significant performance. 
Black Sabbath Madison Square Garden tickets go on sale to the public on September 12 with presales taking place from September 9 to 11. The band’s members intend to put on quite a show for their fans, even better than past tour performances. They want to go out in style, and fans in The Big Apple will be especially eager to pick up tickets for Black Sabbath concert in New York. 
Other U.S. cities that the rockers will visit are Chicago, Minneapolis, Detroit, Denver, San Jose, Los Angeles, Las Vegas and Tacoma. The Canadian cities of Saskatoon, Vancouver, Montreal, Hamilton, Calgary and Edmonton are also on the tour schedule for next year. 
There may even be the release of a final album some time before this year is over, but this was not verified by the band when the tour announcement was made. 
QueenBeeTickets.com has Black Sabbath Madison Square Garden tickets available to heavy metal fans that have been discounted in price for convenience. The popular ticket exchange has an ample supply of tickets available, including many providing premium seating for shows. 
About: 
QueenBeeTickets.com is a reliable and convenient online marketplace serving the secondary market with discounted tickets for all major concerts, sports, and theatre events happening across North America and beyond. Customers are invited to compare prices against other providers offering similar tickets. For the lowest bottom line price, online shoppers can take advantage of Promo Code “DISCOUNT” while tickets last. 
Disclaimer: QueenBeeTickets.com is not associated with any of the artists, teams, venues, organizations, institutions, bands, or artists featured on their website in any way. Furthermore, any names or titles used in this press release are solely for descriptive purposes and do not imply, indicate, or suggest any type of affiliation, partnership, or endorsement.
